name: ONE (itch) (E3kHatena)
description:
Set in a future in which romantic highs have been replaced by a pill, a rare few are unlucky enough to be born as Null. Any amount of contact with ONE will kill you if you're not careful, but luckily a local support group exists to help you navigate this world. Learn about this world, navigate a culture of mass-marketing and addiction, and find one of over a dozen endings, ranging from bitter ends to happy futures. Learn about your fellow members of the support group, help new ones join the cause, and deal with the aftermath of new types of ONE being released. 

  • Twelve happy endings!
  • Four less-than-happy endings, too!
  • Mobile friendly and lightweight!
  • 34,000 words; a 100% playthrough is roughly the length of a novella!
  • Slight changes in your day-to-day will affect where Null advocacy will take you!
  • Learn more about the world on each repeat playthrough!
